issue.title: [C++] Rename namespace BitUtil
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13494](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13494). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`namespace BitUtil` is not allowed by the style guide, which requires namespaces to be in snake_case: https://google.github.io/styleguide/cppguide.html#Namespace_Names
